div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 650 Somesul Cald (formerly Hév Szamos), (995) c. 17 km. WSW of Cluj, Rumania, 1844 Burial: after 78 B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 465 AR. With AR objects Dyrrhachium: 345 dr. Roman Rep.: 120 den. Disposition: Vienna Kenner, AfÖG 24 (1860), pp. 377-84 (full details)
